[id='connecting-to-applications']
= Connecting to applications that you want to integrate

To integrate applications: 

. Create a connection to each application or service that you want to integrate.
. Create an integration. 
. Add connections to the integration. 

The procedure for
creating a connection varies for each application or service. The details
for creating each kind of connection are in 
{LinkFuseOnlineConnectorGuide}[{NameOfFuseOnlineConnectorGuide}].

The following topics
provide an overview of the workflow:

* <<about-creating-connections>>
* <<obtaining-authorization-to-access-applications>>
* <<about-adding-connections-to-integrations>>
* <<viewing-and-editing-connection-information>>
* <<creating-connections-from-custom-connectors>>
* <<specifying-connection-input-output-types>>
